articles.description: Russia is throwing wave after wave of men forward in Ukraine to make ground. The tactic is working.

articles.title: Hamas faces growing public dissent as Gaza war erodes support

articles.description: McDonald's Australia serving its full breakfast menu only until 10:30am, instead of mid day.
articles.title: McDonald’s Australia cuts breakfast hours due to bird flu
